DOC.brief_title: Phase I/II Study Total Body Irradiation , Cyclophosphamide , Fludarabine Followed Alternate Donor Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Patients With Fanconi 's Anemia
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Donor bone marrow , peripheral blood , umbilical cord blood process harvest CD34+ cell . Patients receive preparative cytoreductive therapy comprise total body irradiation day -6 ; cyclophosphamide IV 2 hour day -5 -2 ; fludarabine IV 30 minute day -5 -2 ; methylprednisone IV day -5 24 ; anti-thymocyte globulin IV 4-6 hour day -5 -1 ; cyclosporine IV 2 hour every 12 hour ( every 8 hour patient less 40 kg weight ) day -3 180 , taper absence graft-versus-host disease ; hematopoietic cell transplantation day 0 ; filgrastim ( G-CSF ) IV start day 1 continue blood count recover . Patients follow day 60 , 90 , 180 , annually 3 year .
